alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 16 at 12:44PM MDT until June 20 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Wyoming... Green River near La Barge affecting Lincoln and Sublette Counties. Bear River below Pixley Dam affecting Lincoln County. For the Green River Basin...including Big Piney, La Barge...elevated river levels are forecast. For the Bear River...including Pixley Dam, Cokeville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Bear River below Pixley Dam. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, Bankfull stage. At 8.5 feet, Flood stage. Minor agricultural flooding especially along left bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM MDT Friday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to slowly fall to 7.5 by early next week. - Action stage is 7.5 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks, which may be eroded by the fast-moving water. Please report observed flooding to local law enforcement or emergency management.
